name: DRIFT RACER CARS 3D
description:
Drift your car through the corners and try not to crash into a wall. It's simple: Longer you drift, the bigger drift score you get.

There are six different cars. Collect stars and unlock all of them.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive endless racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.
